snippet: The police in Mumbai, India, arrested two builders after a half-finished residential structure collapsed, killing at least 72 people.
abstract: Police in Mumbai, India, arrest two builders after half-finished residential structure collapses, killing at least 72 people, and injuring 70 more.
lead_paragraph: The police in Mumbai, India, arrested two builders after a half-finished residential structure collapsed, killing at least 72 people.

headline.seo: Builders Arrested in India After Scores Die in Collapse
headline.main: 2 Held in India After Collapse of Building
headline.print_headline: 2 Held in India After Collapse Of Building
